abstract.text: Creates a GRU gradient operation and returns the gradient tensor values.

inlineContent.text: A tensor containing the source data
with the data layout [T,N,I]. In case
then the layout is [T,N,3H] and for
A tensor containing the recurrent weights
the layout is [2,3H,H] and otherwise it is [3H,H].
The input gradient, that is the gradient of a tensor with respect to the first output of the forward pass.
A tensor containing the input weights matrix
- optional, if missing the operation assumes a diagonal unit-matrix.
the layout is [6H,I] and otherwise it is [3H,I].
- optional, if missing the operation assumes zeroes. For
the layout is [6H] and otherwise it is [3H].
A descriptor that defines the parameters for the GRU operation.
array containing gradients for each input tensor, except for
In case an input is nil, no gradient will be returned for it.
The order of the gradients will be: for

abstract.text: Build, compile, and execute compute graphs utilizing all the different compute devices on the platform, including GPU, CPU, and Neural Engine.
The optimized representation of a compute graph of operations and tensors.
Creates a GRU operation and returns the value and optionally the training state tensor.
Creates a GRU operation and returns the value and optionally the training state tensor.
Creates a GRU gradient operation and returns the gradient tensor values.
The class that defines the parameters for a gated recurrent unit (GRU) operation.
The symbolic representation of a compute data type.
A Unicode string value that is a collection of characters.
